About

Jacob Penn

Musician, Programmer, Artist, Creative Technologist, Curious.

born in 1993 in Minneapolis, Minnesota
works and lives in Los Angeles, California

Jacob Penn is an American electronic musician and creative technologist. Focused on the intersection of art, tech, & transcendental experience, his work takes on many forms ranging from electronic music composition, human-computer interaction, custom A/V software, and interactive art experiences.

Jacob Penn holds a BFA in music technology with a minor in digital arts from California Institute of the Arts.

Skills

Sound Design & Composition

Strong background in music composition and sound design. Educated in western classical and post tonal music theories

Audio Plugin Engineering

Consistently striving for a deeper understanding of modern audio technologies. From concept to launch.

Human Computer Interaction

Loves building novel interfaces using the arduino platform and a wide variety of creative coding environments

Full Stack Rails Dev

Experienced web hack.
